name: Leprosy
script:
wsys.affadd("broken" .. matches[2] .. matches[3])
wsys.affadd("broken" .. matches[4] .. matches[5], "necromancy")
matches: ^[A-Z][a-z]+ begins to chant darkly and crusty green sores coat (?:her|his) hands\. (?:She|He) begins to flail (?:her|his) arms wildly and one of (?:her|his) hands brushes your skin. Immediately, your (left|right) (arm|leg) and (left|right) (arm|leg) shrivel up in response\.$
